name: sare-attendance-portal
description: Takes and keeps track of attedence of all members from S.A.R.E

scripts.install: cd client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.build: cd tools && node save-version.js && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"

author: Fernando Valle
